entry.title: WIND WARNING , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 12:47 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: WSW 45 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Tumbler Ridge. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Tumbler Ridge early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
